text: Cutty Sark for Maritime Greenwich is a light metro station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) Bank-Lewisham Line in Greenwich, south-east London. It is named for the nearby ship Cutty Sark in the Maritime Greenwich district. It is the most central of the Greenwich DLR stations, in Greenwich Town Centre. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations
title: Cutty Sark for Maritime Greenwich DLR station
